A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a proud fan of Star Wars\, my hype was infinitely high; and the film left me super happy. I review my personal list of \"my favourite film of ever\" to be this film the top one. Finally we can see not only white vs black\, light vs darkness\, red vs blue: those are symbols\, and the film left me with the thought: \"what I do is what make myself\, me. I can be a symbol\, I can own a symbol\, but I'm just me. A human being\"\n\nAdding to the discussion that Star Wars play a big role with children (educatoinally-speaking)\, it reached to goal of being a milestone in the Star Wars saga. This is not only a good film. This is the real rebourn of the saga.
